name: Mexican Lasagna 2
ingredients: 1 large onion, halved and cut into thin wedges
instructions: Spray pan with PAM over med heat.
Add chicken; cook and stir 5 minutes or until no longer pink.
Cook onion and garlic separately or until lightly brown.
Stir ricotta, sour cream, green chilies, cilantro, cumin and salt together.
Spread 1 cups salsa across bottom of baking dish.
Arrange half of the tortillas over salsa.
Spread half of ricotta mix over tortillas.
Top with half of the chicken.
Top with 1 cups salsa, and 1/2 cups cheese.
Repeat layering with remaining tortillas, ricotta mix and chicken mix.
Sprinkle with remaining 1 cups salsa and 3/4 cups cheese.
Bake 30 minutes or until heated through.
Loosely cover with foil if the cheese browns too quickly.
